skill.name: Binning
skill.perk_bonus: Chance to get {{rarity}} bonus trash drops
recycler.name: Recycler
recycler.desc: Cheaper cost to craft recycling machines
environmentalist.name: Environmentalist
salvager.name: Salvager
salvager.desc: Get better output from recycling machines
sneak.name: Sneak
sneak.desc: Never get caught digging through trash cans
upseller.name: Upseller
upseller.desc: Villagers never hate gifts, even trash
reclaimer.name: Reclaimer
config.ExperienceFromTrashFail.tooltip: Experience gained from searching garbage and finding nothing
config.ExperienceFromTrashSuccess.toolti: Experience gained from searching garbage and finding standard loot
config.ExperienceFromTrashBonus.tooltip: Experience gained from searching garbage and finding bonus loot.  Higher levels provide exponentially more experience
config.ExperienceFromRecycling.tooltip: Experience from putting trash into a Recycling Machine
config.AutomateGrantsXp.tooltip: Whether automating binning/recycling should give experience when using the automate mod
config.PerLevelBonusDropChance.tooltip: Additional percent chance per level of getting a bonus drop
config.RareDropChance.tooltip: Chance that bonus drop will be rare
config.SuperRareDropChance.tooltip: Chance that rare drop will be super rare
config.UltraRareDropChance.tooltip: Chance that super rare drop will be ultra rare
config.RecyclingCountToGainFriendship.to: Number of items to recycle to gain friendship when using Environmentalist profession
config.RecyclingFriendshipGain.tooltip: Amount of friendship to gain with the community for recycling when using Environmentalist profession
config.SalvagerRareDropChance.tooltip: Chance of rare recycling output when using Salvager profession
config.SalvagerSuperRareDropChance.toolt: Chance that rare recycling output will be super rare when using Salvager profession
config.FriendshipRecovery.tooltip: The amount of friendship needed to undo negative reactions to being caught going through garbage when using the Sneak profession.  25 for the vanilla game, but if villager reactions to searching trash cans are adjusted in another mod, this value will need to be changed.
config.ReclaimerExtraValuePercent.toolti: Extra value gained when reclaiming an item via the inventory trash when using the Reclaimer profession
